snippet: Karl Rove’s Crossroads GPS highlighted the F.E.C.’s impotence when it rebuffed the agency’s inquiry on its campaign spending.
abstract: Editorial contends Federal Election Commission's impotence was highlighted by Crossroads GPS rebuff to agency's legitimate inquiry about shadowy sources of group's war chest; calls on Pres Obama to nominate independent professionals to commission and to fulfill his old campaign promise.
lead_paragraph: Karl Rove’s Crossroads GPS highlighted the F.E.C.’s impotence when it rebuffed the agency’s inquiry on its campaign spending.

headline.seo: The Federal Election Commission Is Mocked
